2016 Rio Olympic Medals Information

2020 Tokyo Olympic Games is happening right now.
I made this project to make it easier for people to refer last olympic's data.
This project is built with JavaScript, D3, HTML and CSS.
The data updates inside this project are made on pure DOM manipulation.

Made by Leo Cao
